ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Official confirmation from Ester
ygData.msgSnippet: I thought I had successfully repressed any hope that the result would be anything other than this.  I just kept thinking Doesn t matter, I never use the song
ygData.messageBody:
I thought I had successfully repressed any hope that the result would be anything other than this. I just
kept thinking "Doesn't matter, I never use the song anyway." But, judging by the sick feeling in my
stomach, I guess a little hope did creep in. Shame on me.

Lyressa

"Reece Tom R CPT 25 ID L G4(n)" wrote:
